column1: Funeral services will be at 10:00 a.m. on Monday
column3: 2015 in the Chapel of Sorrells Funeral Home & Crematory of Enterprise with Reverend Glenda Carlson officiating.  Burial will follow in Pleasant Ridge United Methodist Church Cemetery.  The family will receive friends at the funeral home Monday beginning at 9:00 a.m. and continuing until service time.
